siteMetadata.subtitle: Computer Programmer living in Omaha, NE
siteMetadata.title: Blog by Matt Payne

markdownRemark.html:
1. Money is like oxygen: you need it to breath
  2. It’s important to have a rainy day fund
  3. I think it is important to talk with each other about money. https://thefinancialdiet.com/ leads the way.
  4. Yes, the love of money is a root of all evil. And it’s important that we team up so having a rainy day fund is more important than having a fancy car…
  5. My favorite way of saving/investng is The Simple Path to Wealth
  6. I’m inspired by Vicki Robin’s Your Money or your Life
  7. Dave Ramsey’s Financial Peace University should be taken by every couple. Or something like it.
  8. Adam’s https://minafi.com/ is great! Please work through his Interactive Guide to Financial Independence
  9. YNAB - You Need a Budget is a very handy utility. It’s crippled because there are no backups or change control.
  10. PlainTextAccounting.org intrests me, and I have not started practicing it, yet.

frontmatter.description: Pointers to money interesting or useful money things
